#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;


int main(void) {
int t;
int a[1000],i,n,x,sum1=0,sum=0;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{sum=0;
sum1=0;
   scanf("%d",&n);
   for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   sum+=i;
   for(i=1;i<=n-1;i++)
   {
   scanf("%d",&x);
   sum1+=x;
   }
   sum=sum-sum1;
   printf("%d\n",sum);
	   }
return 0;
}
